project.name: ${parent.project.camelcase} RPM

beforeInstallation.script: id ltuser >/dev/null 2>&1 if [ $? -eq 1 ]; then useradd ltuser \ -d /usr/share/java/${parent.project.name}-${project.version} \ -c "LanguageTool Technical User" -M -s /bin/false -U fi
